'''Bongo-Head''' is an event-exclusive variant of the '''Floating Hydro Fungus''' that appears in the [[Fungus Mechanicus]] event.

==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy       = Floating Hydro Fungus

|name_1      = Skill: Piercing Waterdrop
|desc_1      = Condenses the power of Hydro to unleash a Piercing Waterdrop that deals '''450% ATK''' as {{Color|Hydro DMG}} while healing the Lil' Fungi within the party for '''40%''' of their Max [[HP]].
|file_1      = Floating Hydro Fungus Piercing Waterdrop

|name_2      = Bubble Strike
|desc_2      = Unleashes a Precision Bubble that deals '''300% ATK''' as {{Color|AHydro DMG}}. 

|name_3      = Misty Surge
|desc_3      = After casting 2 Precision Bubbles, the next Normal Attack will become a Charged Attack that releases a Mist Bubble, dealing '''500% ATK''' as {{Color|Hydro DMG}} upon hitting its target. 
}}
